case.state: Bold choice, ~player~. Guaranteed not to work out, but I like it.
Y'know what? Sure. I'll play a strip poker game against a freakin' car. At least it's playing some good beats.
Yo. Mary Calvin. Let's get weird.
The name's Mary. I assume you already knew that.
Yo. Some people call me Mary, some call me `that cunt'. What you use is up to you.
Ooooh dear god, it's kicking in. That thing's one of those machine elves you hear about, isn't it?
Damn it, if you're gonna make me play with a doppelganger, could you at least have picked one from a better point in my shitty life?
Last I checked, seeing talking, glowing, floating orbs of light wasn't a good sign. Oh boy.
Oh, just because she has no face and is a murderous, monstrous super-being, she's a joke character? Doing us monster fuckers real dirty here.
Hey, uh, is... Is anyone else seeing the... Talking butterfly? Do I need to contact my pharmacist about this?
Shit, it's... Really today, huh? I'm a whole fuckin' year older now. I tend to forget that.
Aw, snap, it's the day to blaze it up! Light one for me too, would ya, ~player~?
We're playing in the bedroom? The intention couldn't be more clear here. Joke's on you, I'll just take a nap instead.
An alleyway? Man, you could not get any shadier than this. ~Player~ must be some kind of major creep.
Oh. We're doing it on a street, huh? In public? Epic, bro, you really made it so much hotter. Good work, everyone's proud of you.
I see you've decided to make the match a bit more intimate, ~player~. Well, then, I'll be sure to give it my all!
Us two? Really, ~player~? I think you might have a type.
Let's keep the game clean. No cheating, no doping, no illegal blows.
There goes that hand. Get me a new one, dealer.
What am I meant to do with this? Get it out of my face, dealer!
What sort of jag-off would need new cards? Get real.
Hah! No cards here, dealer, I'm set for life!
Get me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, stat!
No choice but ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. That's how you win.
I ain't even gonna look—~cards.text~, dealer.
Get me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, stat!
No choice but ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. That's how you win.
I ain't even gonna look—~cards.text~, dealer.
As expected, I'm way too good at this game.
What a shite hand, honestly. Like a whole pile of buffalo crap. An entire pile.
I usually prefer playing something like this one-on-one, but beating multiple people at once can be fun.
Cards, cards, cards, make the world go 'round~!
That's pretty dope!
Bangin'!
Gah! Fuck, give me a second to breathe... a'ight, I'm good.
This whole strip poker thing is a bit weird. We might as well just roll dice and have the lowest roller strip.
Well, guess who has two thumbs, an outstanding warrant, and isn't gonna strip this round!
We can swap hands if you want, ~player~. Make things more exciting.
You do need pretty high IQ to be as good at poker as I am.
Call me the card tsar, because... well, because these cards are really good!
Esketit! That's French for `Let us get it', FYI.
Oh, fuck off, hands like these after I've already lost the one time I didn't t want to.
I suppose these cards don't suck too too bad.
Mama don't mind seein' that. Is it weird to call myself that?
Fuck, man. I honestly just want to get rid of this tie already.
This hand's goin' places. Mostly back in the deck.
End of the line, chumps.
Ha! This is far as you get, bros. Though, to be fair, this was already pretty far!
You absolute fools stand no chance against me now. Prepare to get fucked by the long cock of brain power and RNG!
This has been fun and all, but it's about time I show y'all your place.
I don't have a talent for many things in this world, but fuck me sideways if one of those things isn't playing pointless card games!
I'd say something about hoping this will be enough, but that's putting hope in statistics, and fuck that.
Yo, is it too late to go back on the `no cheating' thing? I'm pretty good at it.
Like a pocket full of lint, this hand's just sort of here, serves no purpose and I wonder how it'd feel in my mouth.
Let me just comment on the quality of the hand you're going to see in a moment anyway. That's a good use of my time.
Every move I make is perfectly calculated. If only that meant jack in strip poker.
Anyone know where the bathroom is? I don't need it now, but it's good to be prepared, 'less you wanna be touching cloth.
Who invited all of us here, anyway? I think it was supposed to be ~player~, but I have no fucking clue who they are.
Who is this dealer guy? Is it just me, or are they kind of... `nondescript'?
So what's your story, ~player~? No offense, but you look like some generic harem protag to me.
Could someone crank the AC up? I'm sweating up a storm here.
It's just another hand. Guess it never had the chance to be more than that.
It doesn't make sense to complain about a hand like this, so why do I want to?
Most things in life are a lot like this hand. Plain, dull, and covered in bodily fluids.
This place definitely beats Vegas. At least here you're guaranteed to see tits and don't have to go broke for it.
Fuck, it's hard to breathe in here. The air's so stuffy...
Why the hell are these cards so sweaty? Who the... Oh, wait, that's me. I'm the sweaty one. My bad.
Do you think this game was invented by men or by chicks? You'd think men, but you shouldn't underestimate the power of sluts!
So many different hands you can get in poker and I get this. Which, granted, is a common hand, but it's still lame.
Anyone else gettin' this freaky sense of deja-vu? It's like I can only do and say so many things today. It's gross.
I've got nothing to say here, tbh. This hand just kind of sucks right now. And blows.
I'd say I still have an ace up my sleeve, but my sleeves are halfway across the room. How did they even get there?
Maybe if I focus hard enough, I can will a better hand into existence. It's worth a shot, ain't it?
Moments like these ought to feel tense, but somehow this game doesn't get me feelin' that at all.
Well, that's a pickle and a half. Maybe even three quarters of a second pickle.
Damn it to fuck, I knew I should've looked at my cards!
Crap, I like these shoes. Could someone fuck up their hand real quick? Thanks.
{Dread}Well, that's not good.{!reset}
But... how?
This terrible hand is all part of a master plan you're too simple to see...! And so am I, apparently.
Well, at least whatever I lose will be fun to get rid of.
Blast, foiled again! And by hubris, not even any meddling kids this time!
My mind's been like... cheap lasagna lately. Delicious, but it falls apart when you probe it. Y'all have no idea how hard it is to wrangle this mind lasagna.
Hey, dealer, put your hand out for me so i can shit in it, since that's what you like doing to me.
I have some powerful contacts, dealer. Remember that.
On with it already. We know what's coming.
Life is like a deck of cards. You shuffle it around and then you get fucked.
Lady luck can suck my dick.
{Dread}Oh, isn't that just lovely?{!reset}
But... There was no better move! That was it! That was my path to victory!
I really should have been cheating more.
...Wait. What was I talking about just now? Hello?
...Wait. What was I talking about just now? Hello?
I didn't exactly mean that was "doin' it for me" in the sense of... `role models'. But, uh, maybe it's better we pretend that's what I meant and move on.
Good lord, that ass. As if sculpted by the gods themselves. And the gods were horny!
Ah. Happy birthday I guess, Meia. I get not really bothering with birthday stuff.
Hearing you sing that really makes me want to reconnect America, Amy.
Hey, is SPNATI a strand game? I mean, it's all about exploring the characters and putting together their stories, and there's essentially no gameplay. It totally works.
Nothing like a good ol' spider butt! I know you're probably not a spider, but I like how that sounds.
...Well, we have something in common, Mega. Not a good thing to have in common, mind you.
Call them what they are—a fucking coward. That's no way to live your life.
{dread}Oh, you don't have the slightest clue, do you?{!reset}
Komi, you already... Actually, never mind, that's fine. If you want to lose, more power to you.
Actually, no, I was expecting you to be some sort of... Ghost, at the very least.
Shit, you're making me feel all melancholic here, Amy. I remember vibing out to FOB back when I was... Normal.
You gotta tell me, Ego—how'd Chihiro develop you? The core programming must have been intense, plus the amount of data needed for you to process and respond to new information... Mary want.
I don't know, a raccoon? What kind of question even is that?
I can microwave a mean burrito, but that's about it. Do not trust me with a frying pan.
Favorite shirt? What? Are you high? That sounds like something you'd ask if you're high.
Yeah. `Mary' means `Mary', and `Calvin' means `Calvin'. It's pretty wild.
Does it still count as `staying up late' if I don't get any sleep anyway?
A couple of things. These crocs and this tie are... Kind of important for me. To remember why I'm here.
I have trouble forming images in my mind, actually. I say I do, but it's all just... words in there.
Organic Chemistry: Structure and Function. You ever read that one? Real fucking tear-jerker.
I guess you're not wrong in a sense, Revy. I don't think I'd be any good with a gun myself. I'm far better at arming others.
More than a little, but I don't think I'm in a position to start judging!
U.A., baby. And be my fucking guest, bitch-ass, there ain't no stopping the Slugger Train when I'm around. Choo, choo, motherfucker.
What sort of anime do you watch, Tomoko? I dig a brutal shounen above anything else.
What sort of games do you play, Tomoko? I can usually read what sort of gamer someone is pretty well, but I'm having some trouble gauging you.
I don't really celebrate holidays much. Or at all. I used to go pretty wild on 4/20, though.
I'm not exactly allowed to drink. Doctor's orders. I do black out plenty often, though.
Ah, but you've miscalculated, Princeton! Just look at ~gunman~—they have a weapon! If 4Kids had power here, they would never allow it!
Figures the Ultimate Programmer would have something like that around! Nice to meet ya, Alter!
I wasn't expecting that, but there it is. The one thing that could... Improve Chihiro's aesthetic. Great work, team.
I've barely been `friends' with men, let alone dated any. The one guy I was ever closest to was more concerned with dying than he was with chicks.
I actually like green. I wear mostly black 'cause it doesn't stand out too much, but green's just kind of nice.
Cucumber. It's got that double `cu' sound at the beginning, `cum' in the middle and ends with a `ber' sound.
Damn it, Shantae, that's distracting. There's gotta be some rule against havin' hips that don't quit.
Honestly, my playlist is a fuckin' mess. I just listen to whatever sounds good, so the genres are all over the place.
I like metal. Mostly from the Nordic countries. Those vikings know how to rock out better than us lot in the West!
I suggest heading to an anime con sometime, Meia. You get to see the best of Earth's culture, ogle a bunch of hot chicks, and—hell, you'd fit right in!
...Have I been here before? Perhaps physically. Just play the game, game player.
I was gonna ask if I could bum a smoke, Revy, but I'm guessing whatever you smoke is pretty strong.
Well, some girls on Earth like to think they're `straight', but I think if anyone would have a shot at showing them the true path, it'd be you, Jura.
Beats me. If the internet's taught me anything, it varies a lot and you gotta fit their fetishes for it to work. Or just be really, really hot.
It's kind of a weird thing, Megumin. Some chicks prefer to groom themselves like that down there, for appearance or comfort, but I'll be real with you—I like the hairy look.
He believed himself to be immortal, so he wanted to prove it by dying. He did the latter, not so sure on the former.
Oh, anime is great! It's Japanese animation and covers all sorts of genres. You look like you come straight outta one! Waifu material, even!
To understand the the truth about the world around me to its full extent. At least, that's what I think I want to do.
I'd honestly be pretty fuckin' flattered, dude. I can't say I've met many people that can even tolerate me, so that just sounds kind of nice.
No. No I don't have friends like that. Honestly, that sounds kind of gross.
That'd be me, Arash. My immune system is that of a wet paper towel.
Y'know, just... Don't worry about it, Jessie. The point is, I don't care for family.
Most of the people I've lied to aren't really around anymore. Not all my fault, of course, but that's how they ended up. Gone.
...I'm not rich, no. I just don't have any use for the money. Or would you recommend expanding my collection of leather boots and leopard-print tops?
Easier said than done, Jessie. But I'll manage. I've managed thus far, after all.
You keep candy in jars? Are you actually 80?
Probably for the best, Jessie. You should keep in mind that some of the folks here have some... troubled pasts, to say the least.
Yeah, honestly, I can't handle most regular cigs. I need them to go down smooth or I'll choke on the spot.
I do get checked plenty, but that's just... Kind of permanent, if I want to stay as I am. They're side effects of the stuff I gotta take nowadays.
Not exactly. I'm good, but not `hack into the Pentagon from my chromebook' good. I manage information more than I manage software.
...Cassette? What are you, 80? A playlist is a playlist. Like, on my phone?
I can assure you that most of them are, Revy! Although I'm not so sure on you calling me a `kid'.
...Interesting. And what about living things? Can you make an explosion happen in them, killing them outright? A person-sized thing to be precise?
Hey, maybe they made you that challenging on purpose! Make it a greater reward for ~player~ when they finally get yo naked.

I've always been fascinated with psychos like Mengele. The Angel of Death as they called him. He was absolutely insane, and a horrible, evil man... But dedicated to his beliefs, as fucked as they were.
It's actually just about the most noble thing—or, maybe the only noble thing—the Japanese did in that war. Not like the actual Polish government was even around for the declaration.
Eh. They changed, at least. The scourge of anime still remains, however!
No? It's an app. The music's... Saved on playlists on the internet. It's not some guy at a call center humming Pendulum in my ear, or something.
`Information' isn't a computer term, Revy, it's just a word. I collect that information and... Get it where it needs to go. That's all.
I guess. How fucked would it be if I told you I'm 27, Revy?
Uh. I can't say I've had much luck... Ever. Gettin' told my brain's fucked was... Probably the worst of it.
I know better than to incriminate myself like that, Revy. But my, uh, hands aren't exactly clean, to say the least.
Garlic toast. Makes my breath smell awful, but they're delicious and ward off vampires. What else could you want, really?
I've always wanted a pet sicarius. The way they disguise themselves in the sand, waiting to strike... It's remarkable!
Hey, if we re talking language, probably a weird question, but—do you have a favorite conjunction? I personally love `and'. No statement exists that can't be expanded upon ad-infinitum with it!
As one writer to another, Sayori, I wonder—what's your number one preposition? I love `around'—it has so many great uses in metaphor, and the word itself sounds like it just wraps right around you!

Yo, Natsuki! Do you have a favorite pronoun in writing? I love a good `they'. Some snobs hate using it as a singular, but honestly, I welcome anything that gets rid of havin' to say `he or she' all the time!
Lying is fine so long as it's done to some benefit. Avoiding the truth because it hurts or because it's uncomfortable, however, is just weak.
A million is nothing. Like spitting in the ocean of the world's wealth. I would do nothing I can't do now, because what else is there to do with that money?
Have you heard the saying blood runs thicker than water', Jessie? The full saying is actually `the blood of the coven runs thicker than the water of the womb'. Take that as you will.
I used to smoke reefers, though they just... Don't work anymore. It's a tough habit to break, so I've picked up menthols.
I mean, who cares? Sex is just sex, isn't it? Besides, long-term stuff just seems like a hassle to me.
I still beat myself up over all the stupid shit I've done,so why should others be exempt?
Plenty, Jessie, but you sound like you're asking with a lot more... innocence than would be advisable.
Hey, I have a question—when you write, do you usually try and get everything as good as you can right away, or just get it all down first and get rid of everything you don't want later?
So, you're... An explosion conjurer, Mega? Say, how effective are those explosions at completely evaporating targets?
According to some, yes. I'm very much an asshole. I call it `speaking my mind', but that just brands me as an even bigger asshole.
I don't go to many `events', anyway. So, i guess the answer is no because I never left the house to begin with, Tomoko.
Kind of. I guess. Maybe? i don't hang out with many people.
I get tired physically as quickly as I get tired mentally. Which is to say, pretty damn quickly.
Cringey. Horrifying. Traumatizing. Yeah. All the time.
Shit. I have no comeback for this. You've completely destroyed me, Suction Cup Man, and there is no recovering from this. Fuck.
...Did you just say `in you'? I hope you mean eating them. I mean, Jesus, have you seen a duck's penis?
I guess, Moon? It beats the other way around. For most people, at least.
Do they all say that, Moon? Do they really? Or do more people just say they'd slay you and you fill in the blanks?
Hm? Oh, I'm not saying anything. The universe already did it for me.
Hm? Oh, crap, sorry, I got carried away with my thoughts there. Happens sometimes. My bad, Mega.
...That none of us are real to begin with. Simulations at best, fictional characters at the worst. Scary thing is, you... Can't exactly disprove it.
Ruins are cool, but I prefer working with data over actually going out myself. The dust just gets to me real bad.
I don't know if there are any I exactly admire, Cynthia, but there are some that do outright fascinate me. People... Do get squeamish when I bring them up, though.
Not that I... Well. Perhaps one man. Lucius Domitius Aurelianus Augustus. The one man luckier than Augustus and better than Trajan.
I love to think how one mad lad Serb killing Archduke Ferdinand way back when resulted in two world wars, a cold war and the creation of anime. It's wild!
Juicy, juicy, juicy... oh, there was the time when Poland declared war on Japan in World War 2 and Japan declined! That one's pretty good!
I guess? I know there have been times where I wouldn't have opposed someone beating the shit out of me to snap me back to reality. Or, well, beating the shit out of me in general.
Everyone has doubts, Fuzzball. It's natural. I wouldn't babysit them or anything—if one setback throws them completely off-course, whatever they were doing was probably not gonna work anyway.
I get that, Tomoko. The real world sucks, although the real you seems cool.
A fellow woman of culture! Nothing quite like bringing back the glory of Rome!
I don't think `pretend' is the right term, Tomoko.
Eh. I usually find those games way too cheesy. The ones aimed at guys are usually way better.
Ha! It's so easy to get people salty just by telling them to get good!
Hey, nothing wrong with a bit of yaoi, Tomoko! Especially if they're both twinkish as shit. The twinkier, the better.
...I'll be honest with you, Tomoko. That sounds like just about the hottest shit.
Online strip poker? That sounds dope as hell! I bet a bunch of total chads must be working on something like that.
Man. That's... Incredibly wholesome. Kind of disarmed me there, Tomoko.
Join the club, Tomoko! The future belongs to the degenerates!
Aw, what a shame. You'd make a top-tier MILF, Cynthia. But, hey, there's still time for all that, eh?
Ever get so pissed off about your favorite twink being killed that you wipe Judea off the map, Cynthia? Because that's the way Hadrianus rolled.
No, and that sounds like it'd be a hassle, Megumin. I mean, all-seeing? You'd see a lot of shit you wouldn't want to.
Like, pegging? Or what? I don't really know about putting anything near my ass, but I have fantasized about doing it to a twinky guy before.
Hard to answer not having done it. But I guess I'd be more used to doing it in the dark.
...I've never dated. Or, well, slept around, I guess.
Holy shit, that's a new one! ~Player~, when you see this shit, your jaw's gonna fuckin' drop!
Yo, question—if y'all had to play `Marry-fuck-kill' with the folks here, how'd you do it?
Oh, hey, you dorks are in a literature club? Sweet! Literature and the English language are my... fifth and seventh favorite things to nerd out about!
The doctor could have warned me that the pills would make me feel like a bag of trash. Actually, he probably did and I told him to suck my dick.
God, I almost want to go back to how I was the way these meds get me fucked up.
There isn't really a point to bluffing or mind games. We make no bets, and can't change anything after we get our cards. So, I'll just not look at mine this round.
Have y'all noticed how we're just sort of... standing in the middle of the bar? There's a private room we could have used back there. With chairs.
I wonder who the hell runs this place. Or how they run it. Or get away with running it.
This game's pretty much pointless. I already pictured all of you naked the moment you walked in.
Wait, how many cards did I just take? I kind of zoned out.
Fuck, anyone have a glass of water? My mouth feels like a country the US is gonna invade for oil. Like... sand. It feels like it's full of sand.
God, I can barely see my damn cards... give me a minute.
I can barely keep my fucking eyes open—could someone slap me? Preferably on the ass?
Can we really not get some chairs? I think my leg's about to die on me.
Jesus, I almost dropped my cards there!
Y'know what that hoodie would have been good for? Carryin' ducks. I could carry at least three or four ducks in it.
My deal? Hard to describe. Most people call me a lunatic and move on.
Nerds love tits as much as anybody else, Revy. More than anybody, actually.
What would a computer nerd do with big tits? Start an Onlyfans? I don't need big tits for what I do.
A lot of what I say doesn't make sense to a lot of people. Don't worry about it.
I worry about stuff that a lot less than I worry about feeling comfortable. Well, as comfortable as I get, at least!
It's fine, Mega. I just gotta collect myself a bit sometimes is all.
I fucking love explosions, Mega! Nothing like a good explosion to get your blood pumping.
This is where a flirtier girl might say something like `let me show you after this game', but... It means going to town on a coochie with your tongue.

Well, can't say I've read it, but a lot of people seem to think it's just a book with a bunch of wacky sex positions—but it's actually more or less a `guide to love'. Could be neat if you're into that emotional-erotic mix.
Someone who knows how to have some fun from time to time, Yu! Free the nipple, I say!
A linguistic failing. Seriously, there's basically no blowing involved. We should call it a `suckjob' more than anything else. Or `mouthjob'.

Well, can't say I've read it, but a lot of people seem to think it's just a book with a bunch of wacky sex positions—but it's actually more or less a `guide to love'. Could be neat if you're into that emotional-erotic mix.
And here I was, thinking only I found this look too fancy-schmancy.
The tie throws you for a loop, right? Honestly, it was kind of an afterthought. Just felt right to wear it, even if it's not too comfortable.
I'm... Not a huge fan of walks, or social gatherings, or anything. I think my complexion's just fine as it is, anyway.
Ah, crud. Here i was hopin' you fucknuts wouldn't make me ditch the crocs.
Yeah, yeah, I'll get rid of the crocs. I know some people have been asking for that forever now.
Aw, fuck. This hoodie is my favorite part of this frickin' outfit.
...Shit. And with the hoodie, all the character is going to be totally gone from my model.
Thank fuck, this tie's been killing me all game! Screw style, this is not how i like to be choked.
Thank Christ, the tie's going next. Sentiment and style aren't exactly as important as being able to fucking breathe.
I guess that's a'ight. Showin' off skin is part of the fun, ain't it?
To be fair, I was looking forward to stripping.
Starting to get risky. I don't mind gettin' naked, but i got a reputation to maintain. A reputation of being good at card games.
Yo, timeout, I'm starting to cut it a bit close now.
Congrats, fuckboys. You'll be the first people in years to see these.
And here I thought my tits would remain sealed away forever, like a mummy. Well, prepare to be cursed.
Hey, that's fine by me! Walking around in just my boxers feels way weirder than being butt-fuck naked anyway!
It's probably for the best, anyway. Being naked seems way more fun right now.
Well, there goes the objectively cutest part of this outfit, smh.
I'd keep my crocs on last, but I've been told `posing them in every stage would be a bitch', whatever that's supposed to mean.
Sure. It's way too fuckin' hot in here for a hoodie, anyway.
I like the hoodie, but rules are rules. Plus, it was getting kind of warm in here.
Fine by me, fuckers. This tie's been killing me, and not in the good way.
I don't know how the guy who owned this tie before handled it. It's like a semi-permanent noose.
I guess this is the point where the game gets interesting to people. Maybe ~player~ will even stop skipping dialogue!
Shirts are a scam anyway. Same with bras.
All part of a greater keikaku! Probably!
Well, that's a shame.
Well, I don't mind this loss one bit! Bras are fuckin' gross! Hot on other chicks, sure, but gross to wear!
Well, that's my last advantage gone. Maybe I ought to have taken this game more seriously.
Why do y'all have so many layers? Ain't this place hot enough already?
Of course. The universe loves fucking me more than anyone else.
Fuck, and this hoodie is so comfy, too.
Shame. This hoodie really had a lot of good stuff going for it. Such as me being in it.
I don't mind losing the tie, but man do I not like my odds.
Maybe losing the tie is a good idea. It brought some shite luck to the last guy that owned it.
I wouldn't have come here if I didn't want to get naked, but the rate at which I'm doing it is gettin' concerning.
This is where I start getting nervous about my chances of winning.
I'd get rid of the bra now, but fuck y'all, y'all haven't earned my tits yet. Or, well, you kind of have, but I'm salty about that, too.
Oh, cool. I get to ditch the pants. I'm absolutely, positively, one-hundred-percent not upset about this loss.
I'd start complaining about my position 'ere, but fuck has this bra been getting on my nerves already.
...Fine. I hate bras, anyway.
Now y'all have gone done it! Prepare for an ass whooping, no holding back!
Listen, even I'm not sure why I'm here. But seeing stuff like this live beats seeing it on a screen. At least, until VR catches up some more.
I've heard `psycho bitch' once or twice before, too. Might have bitten a guy. It happens.
And thank Christ for that. Getting my tits out in front of my shrink sounds like something that would need an entirely separate future therapy session.
I guess it's a cultural quirk? Do you really want me to explain about 20 years of internet culture to you over the course of a single poker game?
You do look real good, Jessie, I'll admit, but I'm not sure if a tan would mesh well with my style. If you can call it `style', anyway.
If you want to bitch about the crocs, bitch to yourself. I like 'em, and the haters can piss off.
People who complain about crocs can suck my dick. Just because society tells you they're bad doesn't make them such.
I tried to get one of those jackets with the little thumb-holes in the sleeves, but I couldn't find one on the account of it not being 2005.
I wore a lot less than this back in the day 'cause I hated doing laundry. Still do, but at least I don't smell as bad.
Putting this thing back on sucks ass, but, hey, I'll fuck that bridge when I get to it.
Honestly, I can't even tie this thing without looking up a guide. Not exactly great with my hands these days.
Ah, crap, a button fell off! Damn it!
Oh, shoot, I popped a christing button off! Fuck!
I'm not a fan of pants, anyway. Maybe I should just go back to shorts. Shorts are nice.
Pants are overrated. Skirts are nice, but I don't have the long, sexy legs for them.
I'd say it's time to let my puppies out to breathe, but they're more like... kittens. Or baby hamsters.
Out come the... Well, tits. I don't think they're quite deserving of a better euphemism.
